Statute.Title: Criminal Code (medical assistance in dying), An Act to amend the
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Code criminel (aide médicale à mourir), Loi de 2021 modifiant le)

Minister.Text: Minister of Justice and Minister of Health (s. 3.1)

General.Text: Independent Review, 2021, c. 2, s. 3.1(2) (no later than 17.03.2022)
Reports on review to be tabled in each House of Parliament, 2021, c. 2, s. 3.1(3); 2024, c. 1, ss. 2(3) and (4)
Review of provisions, 2021, c. 2, s. 5; 2024, c. 1, ss. 2(1) and (2)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2021, c. 2 (assent: 17.03.2021), ss. 3.1 and 5 in force on assent, except s. 1(2.1) comes into force 17.03.2027, see s. 6 as amended by 2024, c. 1, s. 1
CIF, 2023, c. 1 in force on assent (09.03.2023)
CIF, 2024, c. 1, ss. 1 to 3 in force on assent (29.03.2024)
